text: "Batter Up" is a 2001 hip hop song by American hip hop group St. Lunatics featuring rapper Nelly. The song was the fourth and last single from Nelly's first album, Country Grammar. It was also included on the group's album, Free City. The song was released on September 11, 2001 in the United States and on November 21, 2001 in Germany. It uses the beat from The Jeffersons theme song. Category:2001 songs Category:Nelly songs
title: Batter Up
